name: World Reborn
overview: World Reborn is a cancelled GBA Horizontal Shooter, which also contains role-playing elements. In World Reborn we are introduced to a world where mankind has lost all records of its history, discoveries, and their achievements. In this horizontal shooter you will choose your stage and attack back at the enemy. Collect XP from kills and from pick-ups in the stages and rank both yourself and your ship up to increase your combat abilities. Six powerful pickups that will enhance or change your weapon, give secondary fire, boost your speed and more will be at your disposal. All your progress in this game will be safe through the use of an intricate password system. 18 levels Four ships and five pilots RPG elements, leveling up Password save system
